      # How to Use DSN (Data Science Notes)?

      Yes, I will call Data Science Notes as DSN from now on.

      Please DON'T copy and paste from the codes blocks while following the tutorials. Type everything, I know this will take more time but you will also learn. Win, win ðŸ˜Ž
